com.palantir.giraffe.command

Class CommandContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.palantir.giraffe.command.CommandContext

  • public final class CommandContext
extends Object
    Provides command-independent information that influences how commands execute. For example, the context controls the working directory in which commands execute and the values of environment variables.

    This class provides several static factory methods for creating common contexts. For more complex contexts that set multiple properties, use the builder.

    Instances of this class are immutable.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CommandContext.Builder
      Builds CommandContext objects.

    • Method Detail

      • builder

        public static CommandContext.Builder builder()
        Returns a new CommandContext builder.

      • defaultContext

        public static CommandContext defaultContext()
        Returns the default context object. The default context uses the default environment, the default working directory, and requires that commands exit with status 0.

      • ignoreExitStatus

        public static CommandContext ignoreExitStatus()
        Returns a context that ignores the exit status of commands.
        See Also:
        CommandContext.Builder.ignoreExitStatus()

      • requireExitStatus

        public static CommandContext requireExitStatus(int status)
        Returns a context that requires commands exit with the given status.
        Parameters:
        status - the required exit status
        See Also:
        CommandContext.Builder.requireExitStatus(int)

      • withEnvironment

        public static CommandContext withEnvironment(CommandEnvironment environment)
        Returns a context that sets the given environment before commands execute.
        Parameters:
        environment - the environment
        See Also:
        CommandContext.Builder.environment(CommandEnvironment)

      • workingDirectory

        public static CommandContext workingDirectory(UniformPath path)
        Returns a context that executes commands in the given directory.
        Parameters:
        path - the working directory path
        See Also:
        CommandContext.Builder.workingDirectory(UniformPath)

      • workingDirectory

        public static CommandContext workingDirectory(Path path)
        Returns a context that executes commands in the given directory.
        Parameters:
        path - the working directory path
        See Also:
        CommandContext.Builder.workingDirectory(Path)

      • getEnvironment

        public CommandEnvironment getEnvironment()
        Returns a copy of this context's CommandEnvironment.

      • getExitStatusVerifier

        public Predicate<Integer> getExitStatusVerifier()
        Returns the predicate this context uses to verify the exit status of commands.

      • getWorkingDirectory

        public Optional<UniformPath> getWorkingDirectory()
        Returns this context's working directory. If the returned Optional is not present, this context uses the system-dependent default working directory.

      • getStdoutWindowSize

        public Optional<Integer> getStdoutWindowSize()
        Returns this context's output window. If the returned Optional is not present, the window size is unlimited.

      • getStderrWindowSize

        public Optional<Integer> getStderrWindowSize()
        Returns this context's error window. If the returned Optional is not present, the window size is unlimited.
